Interface IBluetoothReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IReader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IUhfBle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothReader, BluetoothReader_qcom, EmptyUhfBle, RFIDWithUHFBLE, RFIDWithUHFBLE_qcom, RFIDWithUHFBLEN51_qcom, RFIDWithUHFBLEN52_qcom, UHFTemperatureTag, UHFTemperatureTag.RFIDWithUHFBLEN51, UHFTemperatureTag.RFIDWithUHFBLEN52, UHFTemperatureTagsBLEAPI

    public interface IBluetoothReader
extends IReader
    蓝牙读写器的接口
    Interface of Bluetooth reader.

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBluetoothVersion()
        获取蓝牙版本号(acquire Bluetooth version)
        Returns:
        key:VERSION_BT_FIRMWARE 表示固件版本(Firmware Version), key:VERSION_BT_HARDWARE 表示硬件版本(Hardware version) ， key:VERSION_BT_SOFTWARE 表示软件版本(software version)
